name: creations-sdk
description: Static server to host plugin-demo and qr with a host page that iframes plugin-demo.

scripts.start:open: PORT=${PORT:-3012} node server.js & sleep 1 && open http://localhost:${PORT:-3012}/
scripts.start:ball: PORT=${PORT:-3012} node server.js & sleep 1 && open http://localhost:${PORT:-3012}/ball
scripts.local: npm run build:creations && PORT=${PORT:-3012} node server.js
scripts.local:e2e: npm run build:creations && PORT=${PORT:-3012} node server.js & sleep 1 && npx playwright test tests/creations-console-and-screenshot.spec.js --headed; npm run stop
